front.title: IEEE Draft Standard Practice for the Measurement of Sound Pressure Levels of Outdoor Circuit-Breakers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard provides methods for the measurement of sound pressure level produced by outdoor alternating current circuit-breakers in a free-field environment. These methods may also be used indoors or in restricted field, provided that precautions are observed in the measurement and interpretation of the results.
